title: Exclusive: Rep. Harriet Hageman Endorses Donald Trump for President in 2024
description: Rep. Harriet Hageman (R-WY) is endorsing former President Donald Trump in his bid to return to the White House in 2024, Breitbart News has learned exclusively.
author: Matthew Boyle, Matthew Boyle

title: Polls: Donald Trump Leads Potential Primary Opponents by Double-Digits
description: Former President Donald J. Trump leads the rest of the potential 2024 Republican Party primary field by double-digits in a pair of polls published Tuesday.
author: Nick Gilbertson, Nick Gilbertson

title: Poll: Donald Trump Holds Lead over Crowded GOP Primary Field
description: Former President Donald Trump leads a potentially crowded Republican primary field by six points, according to a national poll.
author: Nick Gilbertson, Nick Gilbertson

title: MTG dismisses newly announced presidential candidate Nikki Haley as simply George Bush 'in heels'
description: Marjorie Taylor Greene, a Trump loyalist, was quick to try and puncture Nikki Haley's claims to be a fresh face for the Republican Party.
author: insider@insider.com (Mia Jankowicz)

title: Here are the Republicans considering 2024 presidential runs
description: Here's a look at who's in and who is considering a 2024 run for the Republican nomination.
author: Eric Bradner

title: 5 things to know for Feb. 17: Biden, Earthquake, Ohio toxic train, Ukraine, Tesla
description: Here's what else you need to know to Get Up to Speed and On with Your Day.
author: Alexandra Meeks

title: Georgia Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene calls Nikki Haley ‘Bush in heels’ as former governor enters 2024 race
description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Green, R-Ga., on Monday slammed 2024 presidential candidate Nikki Haley as "Bush in heels" for her more traditional Republican leanings.
author: Bradford Betz

title: Trump tops DeSantis in fresh 2024 GOP presidential primary poll, other potential candidates in single digits
description: Former President Donald Trump leads a field of actual and potential Republican presidential contenders in a new national poll looking at the growing but still hypothetical 2024 GOP race
author: Paul Steinhauser, Andrew Murray

title: Wednesday’s Campaign Round-Up, 2.15.23
description: Today’s installment of campaign-related news items from across the country.
author: Steve Benen

title: Haley jumps into W.H. race earlier than her 2024 competition. There’s a benefit to that
description: If you’re not Donald Trump or Ron DeSantis in 2024, it helps to be the first true non-frontrunner to get into the race.
author: Chuck Todd and Mark Murray and Ben Kamisar and Bridget Bowman and Alexandra Marquez

title: Nikki Haley becomes 5th GOP woman to run for president
description: Former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley’s decision to run for president makes her the fifth prominent Republican woman to run for the White House.
author: Bridget Bowman

title: Liz Cheney Scolds Marjorie Taylor Greene for Wanting 'National Divorce'
description: "Secession is unconstitutional," Cheney wrote to Greene in a Twitter post.
author: Jon Jackson

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Slams Nikki Haley as 'Bush in Heels'
description: Haley, a Republican and former Trump official, announced her candidacy for 2024 on Tuesday.
author: Kaitlin Lewis

title: Unidentified Objects Downed Over U.S. Could Deliver a Big Win for the GOP
description: Reports of foreign objects flying over the country are prompting calls from Republicans to rule out defense budget cuts.
author: Lauren Giella

title: Trump’s meager early 2024 endorsements
description: Nikki Haley's entrance into the 2024 race also means the start of an endorsement battle. Here's how it's played out so far.
author: Aaron Blake

title: Tracking presidential candidates for the 2024 election
description: We are tracking the Democrats and Republicans who have announced they are running for president in the 2024 election and who might announce they're running next.
author: Hannah Knowles
